citations.narrative:
The facility did not submit an annual report for the 2024 fiscal year by the December 1, 2024 deadline. The facility has not
submitted a report as of June 24, 2025.
Timely submission of the annual report including the species and number of animals held and/or used for research,
testing, experiments, or teaching is necessary to inform the USDA Animal Care of the scope of animal use at the facility.
Each reporting facility shall submit an annual report, which covers the previous Federal fiscal year, to the Deputy
Administrator on or before December 1 of each calendar year.
Correct by: July 04, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
No regulated animals present at this time.
n

narrative:
2.36(a) 
   
Annual report. 
The facility did not submit an annual report for the 2024 fiscal year by the December 1, 2024 deadline. The facility has not 
submitted a report as of June 24, 2025. 
Timely submission of the annual report including the species and number of animals held and/or used for research, 
testing, experiments, or teaching is necessary to inform the USDA Animal Care of the scope of animal use at the facility. 
 
Each reporting facility shall submit an annual report, which covers the previous Federal fiscal year, to the Deputy 
Administrator on or before December 1 of each calendar year. 
 
 
Correct by: July 04, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
No regulated animals present at this time. 
 
 n
